_sText:
Got tired of all the bad bhop maps people have been making lately so I decided to make my own.

Took me like 72 hours to make over the course of a month. 

Some (2) people have had problems with the first soundscape, it lasts through levels 1, 2 and 3. It does work for most people though.

If there are any problems, leave a message below and I might be nice enough to fix it. 

Chances are you won't finish this map.

Textures from facepunch forums but because people cried, textures are by reacz.

http://steamcommunity.com/id/badges
